Sal uses a PC with:
- Camtasia Recorder ($200)
- SmoothDraw3 (Free)
- Wacom Bamboo Tablet ($80)

Prior to that, he used: 
- ScreenVideoRecorder ($20)
- Microsoft Paint (Free)

Mac users: In lieu of SmoothDraw, Autodesk Sketchbook Express works (free with a Wacom)
